edu.ncsu.csc216.transit.airport.entrance

Class Ticketing

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.transit.airport.entrance.Ticketing

  • public class Ticketing
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple factory class to generate passengers to go through airport security.
    Author:
    Jo Perry

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ticketing

        public Ticketing()

    • Method Detail

      • setDistribution

        public static void setDistribution(int pctTrusted,
                                   int pctFast)
        Set the proportions of fast track, trusted traveler, and (by inference) ordinary passengers that should be generated. Proportion of ordinary passengers is 1 - (pctFast + pctTrusted).
        Parameters:
        pctTrusted - - proportion of passengers that are TrustedTravelers
        pctFast - - proportion of passengers that are FastTrackPassengers

      • generatePassenger

        public static Passenger generatePassenger(Reporter log)
        Generate a new passenger as described in the class comments.
        Parameters:
        log - - where the passenger will log his/her data
        Returns:
        the passenger created

      • resetFactory

        public static void resetFactory()
        Resets the factory. You can use this for testing ONLY! Do not use it in your simulator.
